CustomField.formula: TEXT(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) &" "& IF (DATEVALUE(NOW()) >= DATE( YEAR (DATEVALUE(NOW())),03,31) - MOD(DATE ( YEAR (DATEVALUE(NOW())),03,31) - DATE (1900,1,7),7) && DATEVALUE(NOW()) < DATE( YEAR (DATEVALUE(NOW())),10,31) - MOD(DATE ( YEAR (DATEVALUE(NOW())),10,31) - DATE (1900,1,7),7), LEFT(TEXT (TIMEVALUE( CreatedDate + (120/1440))),8), LEFT(TEXT (TIMEVALUE( CreatedDate + (60/1440))),8))
CustomField.label: Fecha y hora creaci√≥n
